# Data & Code availability

The menu under the IRB topic provides access to the Islet Regulome Browser (IRB) application and its code. 

1. <mark>[`plotRegulome` R package](https://mireia-bioinfo.github.io/plotRegulome)</mark>. This custom R package contains the necessary functions to download and plot the data contained in the Islet Regulome Browser.

2. <mark>[IRB Shiny App code](https://github.com/mireia-bioinfo/isletregulome_shiny)</mark>. The IRB app is built using the Shiny R package. The linked github repository contains the code and scripts necessary to build the interactive web app.

3. <mark>[Islet Regulome Browser](http://www.isletregulome.org)</mark>. This link provides access to the IRB web app.
